data.comment: Goal! Cauley Woodrow gives Barnsley a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 15, Goal! Barnsley extend their lead to 0-2 through Alex Mowatt.
The first-half is over at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
Michael Smith is replacing Florian Jozefzoon for the home team.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Michael Sollbauer (Barnsley) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Michael Smith keeps Rotherhamâ€™s hopes alive with a headed strike to make it 1-2.
In the minute 65, The home team replace Kyle Vassell with George Hirst.
Jamie Lindsay is booked for the home team.
Barnsley make their first substitution with Luke Thomas replacing Dominik Frieser.
In the minute 74, Valerien Ismael is making the team's second substitution at AESSEAL New York Stadium with Romal Palmer replacing Matty James.
Richard Wood (Rotherham) has received a first yellow card.
Michael Smith for Rotherham has been booked by Stephen Martin and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, Paul Warne (Rotherham) is making a third substitution, with Trevor Clarke replacing Richard Wood.
Jasper Moon is on a sub for Alex Mowatt for Barnsley.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
